description: There have been calls to update patent laws and recognise AI as an inventor. The notion is flawed. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Invented by AI? Emphatically not
title_page: Invented by AI? Emphatically not | The Straits Times
maintext:
Artificial intelligence (AI) has permeated our daily lives, with its human-like capabilities to perform tasks which used to be typically and exclusively performed by humans.
This has prompted national and international organisations to address a tricky issue: Can AI itself be labelled the inventor of a product?
